# SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode.clamp

**Case**

The animation stops after displaying all of its images.

## Declaration

```swift
case clamp
```

## Discussion

After animation ends, the particle continues to display the last image of the sequence. (Or the first, if the animation is playing in reverse.)

## Constants

- **SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode.repeat**: The animation loops after displaying all of its images.
- **SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode.autoReverse**: After the animation displays all of its images, it plays again in reverse order.
